en.title: New desktop version available
en.description: Upgrade now to access custom desktop notification sounds, Russian spell check, and an improved user experience using multiple workspaces.

en.title: New server version available
en.description: Mattermost server v5.30 is now available offering a new Microsoft Teams Meetings plugin, new administrator roles configurable in the System Console, and improvements to the Matterpoll plugin. [Upgrading](https://docs.mattermost.com/administration/upgrade.html) only takes a few minutes.
